title: The Alluring Physician - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Bickering Couple   Doctors   Female Protagonist   Second Chance
author: Fang Fang   方方
description:
“On the one hand she was the idiot sixth lady of the Gu residence, but on the other hand she was also the well-known Great Physician Jin.

Having survived through two lifetimes and now assuming two extreme identities within one life, all of these ordeals were just so that she could finally experience the cruel meaning of love.

But what? Where did this man come from? And what exactly is he trying to do?”>
